item.title: Rockin Roary - All I Want For Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas Easy
All I Want For Christmas Is My two front Teeth Written by Don Gardener
Using the chords: Am C D7 E7 F G7
Suggested Strum Pattern: D DU D DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.

item.title: All I want for Christmas is My Two Front Teeth Ukulele Play Along
item.description: For Educational Use. This video will be used for my ukulele players, with another class singing along. Chords used are: C, D7, G7, F, E7, and Am.

item.title: We Wish You A Merry Christmas - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
We Wish You A Merry Christmas - Traditional
Using the chords: A Am B C D Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D D D or D DU DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.

item.title: Ella Fitzgerald - Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas - Ella Fitzgerald version
Using the chords: A7 Am B7 Bm C D D7 E7 Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU

item.title: Saxophone Dreamsound - Driving Home for Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Driving Home For Christmas - Chris Rea
Using the chords: A Bm C#m7 D E7 Em F#m G I have simplified the chords to make the song accessible to more players. If you would prefer, you can replae the E7 chord tih an E and the C#m7 chord with a C#m.
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: The Pogues - Fairytale of New York
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Fairytale Of New York - The Pogues Featuring Kirsty MacColl
*** Clean radio edit version ***
Using the chords: A Bm D G
Suggested Strum Patterns: Single strums / D DU DU (fast)
I have add the strum pattern for the whole song as it changes throughout.
If D DU DU is too fast just play single strums for the amount eg. D DU DU x3 = D D D
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Easter Egg Hunt by KizCastle - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use.
The pitch has been lowered to make it playable by young ukulele students.
Source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rov5t-aggeQ
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
